article_title: Republican Presidential Primary: Q&A with Chris Christie
article_text: New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is seeing some momentum for his bid for the Republican presidential nomination as his polls improve in New Hampshire and he picks up a string of endorsements from the early primary state. The Republican governor spoke to The Wall Street Journal from his new campaign bus during a four-day New Hampshire swing that...
